description: Example airdrop claim recipes using the 3 unified patterns

recipes.name: Merkle Indexed Airdrop Claim
recipes.description: Claims for airdrops using index-based merkle proofs (UNI, BLUR, 1INCH, SAFE, OP)

rules.description: Claim tokens using index-based merkle distributor

recipes.name: Merkle Simple Airdrop Claim
recipes.description: Claims for airdrops using address-based merkle proofs (ENS, dYdX, LOOKS, ZRO, STRK, ZK)

rules.description: Claim tokens using simple merkle distributor

recipes.description: Claims for airdrops with on-chain eligibility (ARB, EIGEN)

rules.description: Claim tokens from on-chain distributor - no params needed

howToCheck.merkle_indexed: Call isClaimed(index) on contract to check if already claimed. Need to get index from eligibility API.
howToCheck.merkle_simple: Call claimed(address) or isClaimed(address) on contract with your wallet address.
howToCheck.onchain: Call claimableTokens(address) on contract to get claimable amount. If > 0, you can claim.
